Documentation

Analog controller

last updated: Jan 24, 2016

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry’s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s

Simple html sample

Elements with an data-cwc-controller="analog" attribute applied to them will be treated as an Analog component by the cwc object.

Add a the cwc style to your Analog controller with the .cwc-style class.

JavaScript Declaration

cwc.ControllerMaster({}) must be included and the cwc.PullbarController({}) has to be initiated after the DOM has finshed loading.

Analog controller Instructions

Additional settings can be added to each Analog controller through the use of the data-cwc-instructions data attrabute.

Properties Type Vales
movement-type String pan or touch
on-movment Hook The hook name created on the client wish to invoke

Analog controller movement types

You can change the way the user intracts with the Analog controller by setting the movement-type property within the data instructions attribute.

Properties Type Vales
movement-type String pan or touch

Pan

You can spesify a Hook to be called for when the user is interacting with the Analog controller. Mutipal Analog controller’s can be defined in one document.

Touch

You can spesify a Hook to be called for when the pull bar is pulling by providing an on-pull parameter within the. Mutipal Pullbars can be set in one document.

On movment

You can spesify a Hook to be called for when the component is moving, by defining a hook the the on on-movement parameter within the components instructions attribute.

Properties Type Vales
on-movment Hook The hook name created on the client wish to invoke

JavaScript

HTML
